AI Description: Bactopia is a bioinformatics pipeline that leverages best practices and state-of-the-art tools to perform bacterial genome analysis. It automates the process of quality control, assembly, annotation, and more, providing researchers with a streamlined workflow for analyzing bacterial genomes.
Core Features: Quality Control Of Sequencing Data, Genome Assembly, Functional Annotation, Comparative Genomics, Identification Of Antibiotic Resistance Genes, Phylogenetic Analysis
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Genomics, Bacterial Genome Analysis, Pipeline
